QuestData.Title: Grandma's Lost It Alright
QuestData.Description: Leave? Now?$B$BWell, if I must, then I must. But will you be a sweetheart and find something for me?$B$BI've lost my favorite book and won't leave without it.$B$B<After you explain the gravity of the situation, Grandma Wahl shakes her head condescendingly.>$B$BDear, just find the book will you?
QuestData.CompletionText: How goes it, dear? Will you be staying for tea?
QuestData.RewardText: Why thank you, $n. I hope you didn't peek!$B$BWhere are your manners, dear?
